WorkItem.ClosedComment: If you have a specific repro causing issues which you can share feel free to re-open this. Otherwise issue 779 seems to encapsulate the general issues you're seeing which we're aware of in the current bits. Our current work on scalability will hopefully alleviate most if not all of the issues you are having.
WorkItem.Description: As my TS file gets larger and more complex (structure, referencing other TS files, etc) the intellisense gets slower and slower. I don't know if this is related to the issue (#779) I am also experiencing, which I have commented on as well.
WorkItem.Summary: Intellisense gets slower as TS file gets large/more complex
